items.sentence: Tom helped himself to another dish of ice cream.
Tom hid under his bed, but his mother found him.
Tom invited Mary to a party at the country club.
Tom is just sitting on the porch, doing nothing.
Tom is now managing the business for his father.
Tom didn\'t want Mary to go to Boston with John.
Tom didn\'t want Mary to know what had happened.
Tom didn\'t want me to tell you about the party.
Let\'s see if we can come up with a better plan.
Let\'s start focusing on more important matters.
